entries.title: Variant rejection: Color in name
entries.description: Use semantic name like 'primary'

entries.title: Variant rejection: Shape in name
entries.description: Use prop like `radius`

entries.title: Variant rejection: Combination name
entries.description: Compose: `variant='primary' size='lg'`

entries.title: Variant rejection: Single use case
entries.description: Create specialized component instead

entries.title: Variant rejection: Not in design system
entries.description: Variants must come from design

entries.title: Semantic status variants
entries.description: Represent system or data states - always semantic. success: Operation completed, positive outcome; error: Operation failed, requires attention; warning: Caution needed, potential issue; info: Neutral information, no action required; pending: In progress, awaiting completion; active: Currently selected or in use; disabled: Unavailable for interaction

entries.title: Semantic action variants
entries.description: Represent visual hierarchy and user intent. primary: Main action, ONE per view; secondary: Supporting action, complements primary; default: Standard action, no emphasis; ghost: Low emphasis, minimal visual weight; outline: Medium emphasis, bordered style; destructive: Dangerous action, requires confirmation; link: Navigation, text-style button

entries.title: Variant anti-pattern: Color in name
entries.description: Use `variant='destructive'`

entries.title: Variant anti-pattern: 7+ variants
entries.description: Split into multiple props

entries.title: Variant anti-pattern: Single-use variant
entries.description: Use props or new component

entries.title: Variant anti-pattern: Duplicates props
entries.description: `variant='primary' size='lg'`

entries.title: Variant anti-pattern: Boolean flags
entries.description: Single `variant` prop

entries.title: Variant anti-pattern: Changes behavior
entries.description: Behavior = props, not variants

entries.title: Pre-build gate: Does an existing component solve this?
entries.description: If yes: Use it. Stop.. If no: Continue

entries.title: Pre-build gate: Is there a real use case (design/ticket)?
entries.description: If yes: Continue. If no: Don't build

entries.title: Pre-build gate: Will this break existing consumers?
entries.description: If yes: STOP. Deprecate instead.. If no: Continue

entries.title: Pre-build gate: Am I adding more than 3 props?
entries.description: If yes: Step back. Simplify.. If no: Continue

entries.title: Red flag: Adding 5+ props at once
entries.description: Split into multiple components

entries.title: Red flag: Complex conditional rendering
entries.description: Extract sub-components

entries.title: Red flag: Inline styles appearing
entries.description: Use design tokens

entries.title: Red flag: Copy-pasting from another component
entries.description: Extract shared primitive

entries.title: Red flag: "Just in case" additions
entries.description: Remove. Add when actually needed.

entries.title: Red flag: Fighting the type system
entries.description: Design is wrong. Rethink approach.

entries.title: The 3-3-3 Rule for component APIs
entries.description: 3 sizes max: sm, md, lg. 3-5 variants: Only what designs require. 3 props or less: Per feature addition

entries.title: Forbidden composition: Dialog inside Dialog
entries.description: Creates confusing focus management

entries.title: Forbidden composition: Sheet inside Sheet
entries.description: Overlapping layers are disorienting

entries.title: Forbidden composition: Tooltip inside Tooltip
entries.description: Nested hover states are inaccessible

entries.title: API constraint: Maximum Props (limit: 7)
entries.description: Miller's Law - humans can hold 7±2 items in working memory. Action: If more than 7 props needed, split into multiple components or use composition

entries.title: API constraint: Maximum Booleans (limit: 2)
entries.description: Boolean props create exponential variant combinations (2^n). Action: Replace boolean combinations with variant enum prop

entries.title: API anti-pattern: Kitchen Sink Component
entries.description: Issue: Does everything, 15+ props. Fix: Split into focused components

entries.title: API anti-pattern: Boolean Explosion
entries.description: Issue: isX, isY, isZ creating 8+ variants. Fix: Single variant enum

entries.title: API anti-pattern: Prop Drilling Icons
entries.description: Issue: leftIcon, rightIcon, icon props. Fix: Composition with children

entries.title: API anti-pattern: Flat Feature Display
entries.description: Issue: All 50 options visible at once. Fix: Progressive disclosure

entries.title: API anti-pattern: Deep Navigation
entries.description: Issue: 5+ clicks to reach feature. Fix: Flatten hierarchy, add shortcuts

entries.title: API anti-pattern: Just In Case Props
entries.description: Issue: Props added for hypothetical needs. Fix: YAGNI - add when actually needed

entries.title: Atomic level: ATOM — Single element
entries.description: No composition, standalone UI elements. The most basic building blocks.
entries.example: Examples: Button, Input, Badge, Avatar, Icon

entries.title: Atomic level: MOLECULE — Atom group
entries.description: Simple groups of atoms working together. Fixed sub-parts with defined structure.
entries.example: Examples: Dialog, Tabs, Select, Dropdown, SearchInput

entries.title: Atomic level: ORGANISM — UI section
entries.description: Complex sections with business logic. Self-contained interface components.

entries.title: Atomic level: TEMPLATE — Page layout
entries.description: Page structure without content. Defines the wireframe and layout grid.
entries.context: State: State management library (Redux, Zustand, etc.)

entries.title: Atomic level: PAGE — Real content
entries.description: Template filled with actual data. Complete user-facing screens.
entries.context: State: State management library (Redux, Zustand, etc.)

entries.title: Architecture anti-pattern: God Component
entries.description: Problem: Organism that tries to do everything. Fix: Break into smaller, focused components

entries.title: Architecture anti-pattern: Leaky Abstraction
entries.description: Problem: Exposing internal implementation details. Fix: Keep public APIs clean and stable

entries.title: Architecture anti-pattern: Wrong Domain
entries.description: Problem: Product-specific logic in Shared or Core. Fix: Keep boundaries clear, move to Products/

entries.title: Architecture anti-pattern: Missing Type
entries.description: Problem: Skipping atomic type label. Fix: Essential for understanding complexity

entries.title: Architecture anti-pattern: Circular Dependency
entries.description: Problem: Import cycles between components. Fix: Always flow dependencies downward

entries.title: Architecture anti-pattern: Undocumented Component
entries.description: Problem: Missing stories and documentation. Fix: Future maintainers need context

entries.title: Safe change: Add Optional Props
entries.description: Use optional syntax, always provide sensible defaults
entries.example: Add optional `loading` prop with default `false`; Add optional `className` for custom styling; Add optional callback props (`onFocus`, `onBlur`)

entries.title: Safe change: Add New Variants
entries.description: Extend variant configuration without modifying existing values
entries.example: Add `ghost` variant to existing options; Add `lg` size to size options; Add semantic variants (`success`, `warning`)

entries.title: Safe change: Fix Bugs
entries.description: Document fix in changelog, verify no visual regression
entries.example: Fix incorrect ARIA attributes; Fix focus trap behavior; Fix contrast ratio issues

entries.title: Safe change: Improve Internals
entries.description: Internal changes only, no API surface changes
entries.example: Optimize re-render performance; Improve type definitions; Add missing ref forwarding

entries.title: Safe change: Add Accessibility
entries.description: Additive improvements, don't change existing behavior
entries.example: Add missing ARIA labels; Improve keyboard navigation; Add screen reader announcements

entries.title: Breaking change risk: Rename Props
entries.description: Mitigation: Deprecate old prop, support both during transition

entries.title: Breaking change risk: Remove Props
entries.description: Mitigation: Mark `@deprecated`, maintain for 2 major versions minimum
entries.example: Remove `size` prop entirely; Remove deprecated variant; Remove callback prop

entries.title: Breaking change risk: Change Prop Types
entries.description: Mitigation: Use union types to support both during transition

entries.title: Breaking change risk: Remove Exports
entries.description: Mitigation: Re-export from new location, mark `@deprecated`
entries.example: Remove component from public API; Remove sub-component export; Remove type export

entries.title: Clean code: Dead code
entries.description: Problem: Commented out code, unused variables. Fix: Remove completely - version control is your backup

entries.title: Clean code: Duplicated logic
entries.description: Problem: Same validation in multiple places. Fix: Single source of truth utility

entries.title: Clean code: Repeated calculations
entries.description: Problem: Recalculates on every render. Fix: Memoize appropriately

entries.title: Clean code: Silent failures
entries.description: Problem: Errors logged but user unaware. Fix: Add UI feedback for all errors

entries.title: Clean code: Magic numbers
entries.description: Problem: Hardcoded values without context. Fix: Named constants with meaningful names
